name: Logos Library System File
summary: Learn about .LSF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Libronix DLS is a subsidiary of Logos Bible Software and is used in the Logos software for downloading translations of the Bible and other religious books.

description: Data file used by Libronix Digital Library System (DLS), a program used by other applications for digital book management; saved alongside a .LIX file, both of which must be present to read the book.
